articles.title: House: Senate killed P200 wage hike bill
articles.description: The promise of passing a historic measure to raise the long-stagnant wages of workers was quashed anew.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — The promise of passing a historic measure to raise the long-stagnant wages of workers was quashed anew after the 19th Congress adjourned without a reconciled version from both the Senate and House of Representatives.

articles.title: UN overwhelmingly demands immediate Gaza ceasefire over US, Israel opposition
articles.description: The United Nations General Assembly on Thursday overwhelmingly demanded an immediate, unconditional and permanent ceasefire in the war in Gaza and aid access, after the United States vetoed a similar effort in the Security Council last week.
articles.content:
The text garnered 149 votes in favor, while 19 countries abstained and the U.S., Israel and 10 others voted against.

articles.title: For a healthy Father's Day, try a blend of tradition and taste
articles.description: A Father's Day meal doesn't have to fall into unhealthy traps. Try these ideas for keeping things fun and flavorful.
articles.content:
(Halfpoint Images/Moment via Getty Images)
Few traditional meals for Father's Day are made with health in mind. That's because many dads don't associate healthy food with flavor.

articles.title: Philconsa: Senate act can endanger PH democracy
articles.description: The Senate’s decision to “return” the impeachment case against Vice President Sara Duterte to the House may constitute grave abuse of discretion.
articles.content: The Senate’s decision to “return” the impeachment complaint against Vice President Sara Duterte to the House of Representatives may constitute grave abuse of discretion, according to the country’s oldest constitution watchdog, warning that any circum... [7018 chars]

articles.title: Google Cloud outages: Spotify, Discord, Snapchat and more partially down
articles.description: Google and other platforms are experiencing partial outages.
articles.content: Google Cloud experienced outages today that led to disruptions for many online services. Reports of issues for Google products and others began around 11AM PT/2 PM ET. The company was able to restore function to its own apps, but several other busine... [1874 chars]

articles.title: Police revise death toll of Air India crash to more than 240, with dozens more casualties suspected
articles.description: Sole survivor, a British-Indian man, described scene of devastation after plane crashed into building
articles.content:
Police in the western Indian city of Ahmedabad said more than 240 people were killed on Thursday when an Air India plane bound for London with 242 people on board crashed on to a medical college hostel, revising an earlier death toll.

articles.title: Air India crash survivor jumped out of emergency exit, walked down the street
articles.description: Social media footage showed a man in a bloodstained white T-shirt and dark pants limping along a road and being helped by a medic.
articles.content:
New Delhi: Ramesh Viswashkumar, the only known survivor out of the 242 people onboard an Air India plane that crashed in Ahmedabad, had been sitting near an emergency exit on the London-bound flight and managed to jump out, police said.

articles.title: Air India crash: One survivor reported; 241 killed
articles.description: An Air India passenger plane bound for London and carrying more than 240 people crashed into a medical college after takeoff Thursday in Ahmedabad, India, officials said.
articles.content:
John McDermid, a computer scence professor at the University of York with expertise in safety engineering, said that while it was too early to know much about the cause of the crash, it appeared to be very surprising at first glance.

articles.title: Missing link star? Why this 'teenage vampire' white dwarf has scientists so excited
articles.description: Astronomers have discovered a "teenage vampire" dead star in the process of devouring a companion star during a short-lived, "missing link" phase of its evolution.
articles.content:
Inset: an illustration of a white dwarf. Main top: Gaia22ayj seen in X-rays and visible light. Main bottom: images of Gaia22ayj taken by the Zwicky Transient Facility.
